mapper.select:
select * from bsc_parameter t where (t.owner_org_id = #{owner_id} or t.param_type_id = '01')
and t.param_type_id = '${param_type_id}'
order by param_type_id,parameter_id
mapper.insert: insert into bsc_parameter (parameter_id, parameter_name, data_type_id, value, param_type_id, owner_org_id) values (#{parameter_id}, #{parameter_name}, #{data_type_id}, #{value}, #{param_type_id}, #{owner_id})
mapper.delete: delete from bsc_parameter t where t.parameter_id = #{parameter_id}

choose.when:

and ( t.bank_org_id like '%${searchObjectId}%' or t.bank_org_name like '%${searchObjectId}%' )

select count(*) from vw_bsc_employee t where t.bank_org_id = #{orgId}
and ( t.employee_id like '%${searchObjectId}%' or t.employee_name like '%${searchObjectId}%' )
